title: Agastya Nanda on why he became very religious Was a really anxious person - India Today
text: Actor Agastya Nanda recently spoke about how he embraced his spiritual and religious side Speaking on his sister Navya Nanda039s podcast What the Hell Navya Agastya said quotI was a really anxious person and I say was because I went through a really bad phase of it I used to feel a lot of anxiety When yoursquore living in a world where therersquos so much going on you do one thing that grounds you And I think our generation are very anxious people Because wersquore so used to getting things in an instant Wersquove lost patience and wersquove lost faith Wersquove lost faith that things will work out or things will be okay because wersquore so used to things being certain nowrdquoWatch the video here ldquoI know you guys laugh at me but I became very religious and spiritual And it came naturally It just gives you something to believe in thatrsquos beyond your controlquot the actor added Agastya also spoke about how he was quite anxious before the debut of his first film The Archies quotWhen I started acting doing my first film I was like lsquoI donrsquot know what Irsquom going to do if Irsquom going to do well if people are going to like me if theyrsquoll think Irsquom badrsquo There are so many things I did my best and I was like lsquoGod I leave it up to yoursquo I have to keep faith in something beyond me Whoever you believe in whether itrsquos God or energy If you just pass on that burden it relieves youquotAgastya Nanda made his debut with the Zoya Akhtar directorial The Archies alongside Suhana Khan and Khushi Kapoor Published By Anvita SinghPublished On Feb 23 2024ALSO READ 039Watered-down versions of each other039 Agastya Nanda compares Bachchan womenMust Watch
